text:
@senatemajldr - F35’s?
- FBI buildings?
- Big Biz lunch deductions 
- COVID-19 Liability shields like you gave gun manufacturers?

Unclutch your pearls, pal. You and the rest of the senate GOP enabled this disaster.

#MoscowMitchMcConnell
